title: Cherry Bakewell fondant fancies
description: Almonds and cherries are a great combination - used to great effect in these pretty individual cakes.For this recipe you will need a freestanding mixer with a whisk and beater attachment, a deep 23cm/9in square cake tin and a piping bag fitted with a medium star nozzle.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz icing sugar, sifted, plus extra if the mixture is too wet and to dust
75g/2½oz unsalted butter, melted, plus extra for greasing tin
1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest only
